thread.title: Diane Vanden Hogen
thread.title_full: ZipRecruiter reviewed by Diane Vanden Hogen

author: Diane Vanden Hogen
title: Diane Vanden Hogen
text: Les was extremely helpful in helping me add and edit interview questions, add email templates and instructed me on how to send them. He also gave advice on how I could edit our job postings. He is going to email me some demo instructions, which I'm sure will help me even more.
